Title: ELSA-2021-9471:  Unbreakable Enterprise kernel-container security update (IMPORTANT)
Description:
[4.14.35-2047.507.7.6.el7]
- fuse: fix live lock in fuse_iget() (Amir Goldstein)  [Orabug: 33406810]  {CVE-2021-28950}
- block: workaround to avoid self-deadlock in del_gendisk (Junxiao Bi)  [Orabug: 33406819]
- net: bonding: add new option arp_allslaves for arp_ip_target (Venkat Venkatsubra)  [Orabug: 33406814]
- net/mlx5: Rate limit errors in command interface (Leon Romanovsky)  [Orabug: 33406805]

Criterions.Comment: kernel-uek-container is signed with the Oracle Linux 7 key
